string.name: language
string.comment: Use the abbreviation of Common Voice (e.g. Italian -> it, Swedish -> sv-SE, ect.) (https://commonvoice.mozilla.org/{YOUR_LANGUAGE_CODE})

string.comment: Text | If it's not set a username

string.name: txt_introduction_app_first_launch
string.comment: txt_introduction_app_first_launch Text | First-run | Don't translate "Saverio Morelli", "CV Project", "Common Voice", "Mozilla"

resources.string: CV Project is an unofficial app for Mozilla Common Voice. It\'s developed by Saverio Morelli without any support or partnership with Mozilla.

string.comment: Text in Settings where there are not any experimental features available

resources.string: No experimental features are now available

string.name: txt_show_sentence_at_the_ending
string.comment: Switch-Button in Settings | This permits you to enable/disable the showing of the sentence text (in Listen) just when the clip is completed

resources.string: Show sentences text when clips are listened completely
Show report icon (top-right) instead of button (bottom)

string.name: enable_ads_google_play_in_section
string.comment: Switch-Button in Settings | Do not translate {{section_name}} -> it indicates 'Home', 'Speak' and 'Listen'

string.name: txt_speak_and_listen

string.name: txt_closing
string.comment: Label in Listen & Label in Speak

resources.string: Ø®Ø·Ø§. Ù‚Ø·Ø¹Ù‡â€ŒÙ‡Ø§ÛŒ Ù…ÙˆØ¬ÙˆØ¯ Ø¨ÛŒØ´â€ŒØªØ±ÛŒ Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÛŒ Ø§ÛŒÙ† Ø²Ø¨Ø§Ù† ÙˆØ¬ÙˆØ¯ Ù†Ø¯Ø§Ø±Ø¯.
You have run out of offline sentences. Connect to the Internet to download more sentences to record.
You have run out of offline clips. Connect to the Internet to download more clips to validate.
You can record {{n_sentences}} more sentences before you need to connect to the Internet.
You can validate {{n_clips}} more clips before you need to connect to the Internet.

string.name: txt_listening_clip
string.comment: Text in Listen | This text indicates you turned on 'Show sentences text when clips completed'

resources.string: \"{{feature_name}}\" is enabled. Go to Settings to disable it.
There aren\'t any more sentences in the Common Voice server. Try later or try to contact Mozilla.
There aren\'t any more clips in the Common Voice server. Try later or try to contact Mozilla.

plurals.name: text_continue_to_validate_1
plurals.item: You have already validated %d clip in a row, continue this amazing work!
You have already validated %d clips in a row, continue this amazing work!

plurals.name: text_continue_to_validate_2
plurals.item: Continue to validate clips, you validated %d clip in a row.
Continue to validate clips, you validated %d clips in a row.

plurals.name: text_continue_to_validate_3
plurals.item: Excellent work! You have already validated %d clip in a row.
Excellent work! You have already validated %d clips in a row.

plurals.name: text_continue_to_validate_4
plurals.item: Wow, you have superhuman powers! You validated %d clip in a row!
Wow, you have superhuman powers! You validated %d clips in a row!

plurals.name: text_continue_to_send_1
plurals.item: You sent %d recording in a row.
You sent %d recordings in a row.

plurals.name: text_continue_to_send_2
plurals.item: Good job! You sent %d recording in a row.
Good job! You sent %d recordings in a row.

plurals.name: text_continue_to_send_3
plurals.item: Congratulations! You achieved the milestone of %d recorded sentence. Keep going.
Congratulations! You achieved the milestone of %d recorded sentences. Keep going.

plurals.name: text_continue_to_send_4
plurals.item: Wow, you have superhuman powers! You recorded %d sentence in a row!
Wow, you have superhuman powers! You recorded %d sentences in a row!

plurals.name: text_almost_achieved_dailygoal_listen
plurals.item: You miss only %d clip to achieve your daily goal of {{dailygoal}}!
You miss only %d clips to achieve your daily goal of {{dailygoal}}!

plurals.name: text_almost_achieved_dailygoal_speak
plurals.item: You miss only %d sentence to achieve your daily goal of {{dailygoal}}!
You miss only %d sentences to achieve your daily goal of {{dailygoal}}!

If you\'re not sure whether to accept or reject a recording, you can read the official guidelines for validation on Mozilla Discourse.\nYou also can find this link later in Settings.
Sorry, this feature doesn\'t exist yet.\nWe\'re working constantly to improve the app, so check back later to see if it\'s been added.

string.name: new_badge_earnt_message
string.comment: Message text when you got a new badge

resources.string: Hooray! You have just earned a new badge.\nGo to the {{profile}} > {{all_badges}} to see all your badges.
You got this badge because you validated at least {{n_clips}} clips.
You got this badge because you recorded at least {{n_sentences}} sentences.
You got this badge because you validated or recorded at least {{n_total}} clips.
Ú©Ø§Ø± Ù†Ú©Ø±Ø¯.\nÙ„Ø·ÙØ§Ù‹ Ø¯ÙˆØ¨Ø§Ø±Ù‡ ØªÙ„Ø§Ø´â€ŒÚ©Ø±Ø¯Ù‡ ÛŒØ§ Ø¨Ø§ ØªÙˆØ³Ø¹Ù‡â€ŒØ¯Ù‡Ù†Ø¯Ù‡ ØªÙ…Ø§Ø³ Ø¨Ú¯ÛŒØ±ÛŒØ¯.

string.name: messageDialogErrorCode
string.comment: Message text | Generic error | Don't translate EX-{{error_code}}

resources.string: That didn\'t work. Please try again, or contact the developer.\nError code: EX-{{error_code}}
Ù†Ø®Ø³Øª Ø¨Ø§ÛŒØ¯ ÙˆØ§Ø±Ø¯ Ù¾Ø§ÛŒÚ¯Ø§Ù‡ ÙˆØ¨ ØµØ¯Ø§Ù‡Ø§ÛŒ Ø§Ø´ØªØ±Ø§Ú©ÛŒ Ø´Ø¯Ù‡ Ùˆ Ø³ÛŒØ§Ø³Øª Ù…Ø­Ø±Ù…Ø§Ù†Ú¯ÛŒØ´ Ø±Ø§ Ø¨Ù¾Ø°ÛŒØ±ÛŒØ¯.

Ø§Ú¯Ø± Ø¨Ø§ Ù¾Ø§ÛŒÚ¯Ø§Ù‡ Ø±Ø³Ù…ÛŒ Ø¢ÙˆØ§Ù‡Ø§ÛŒ Ù…Ø´ØªØ±Ú© Ù…Ø´Ú©Ù„ Ø¯Ø§Ø±ÛŒØ¯ØŒ Ø¯Ø± Ø§Ù†Ø¬Ù…Ù†â€ŒÙ‡Ø§ÛŒ Ø¯ÛŒØ³Ú©ÙˆØ±Ø³ ÛŒØ§ Ù…Ø®Ø²Ù† Ú¯ÛŒØªâ€ŒÙ‡Ø§Ø¨ Ù…ÙˆØ²ÛŒÙ„Ø§ Ú¯Ø²Ø§Ø±Ø´ Ú©Ù†ÛŒØ¯ ØªØ§ Ø¨ØªÙˆØ§Ù†Ù†Ø¯ Ø±ÙØ¹Ø´ Ú©Ù†Ù†Ø¯.
Do you like the app? You can support my work. Buy me a coffee on PayPal or LiberaPay.
You are now offline and the app switched to offline mode automatically.\nThis means you can continue to record and validate, but the requests will be sent later.
You can tell when you are in offline mode by looking for this icon on the screen:
You can tap that icon to see downloaded clips and sentences.
The Offline mode is not enabled, so you can\'t use the app without an Internet connection.\nTo use the Offline mode feature, turn on it in Settings.
Do you know you can support my work freely? Please, if you like the app, consider to turn on ad banners in Settings.

plurals.name: text_opened_the_app_n_times_in_a_row
plurals.item: Well done! You opened the app %d day in a row.
Well done! You opened the app %d days in a row.

plurals.name: text_share_n_times_in_a_row
plurals.comment: Message text to share on socials
plurals.item: I\'ve opened the CV Project app %d day in a row! Download it too, so you can contribute to the Common Voice project with your smartphone.
I\'ve opened the CV Project app %d days in a row! Download it too, so you can contribute to the Common Voice project with your smartphone.

resources.string: Choose how many sentences you want to record and clips you want to validate (sum of them) per day.
Well done! You achieved your daily goal.\nYou validated {{n_clips}} clip(s) and recorded {{n_sentences}} sentence(s).\nFeel free to continue contributing to Common Voice.

string.name: share_daily_goal
string.comment: Button when you achieve a daily goal

string.name: share_daily_goal_text_on_social
string.comment: This is the text will go shared | Don't translate {{link}}, hashtags (#CVAndroid, #CommonVoice) and tag (@mozilla)

resources.string: I\'ve just achieved my daily goal for @mozilla #CommonVoice using #CVProject.\nJoin in and contribute! Install CV Project from Google Play, F-Droid or Huawei AppGallery now {{link}}

string.name: daily_goal_motivational_message
string.comment: Message text | The comma ',' is used to divide 'thousands'. Use the correct sign in your language

resources.string: 10,000 hours is achievable in just over 6 months if 1,000 people record 45 clips a day.
A new version of the app is available (release {{n_version}}). You can update it from your favourite store (F-Droid, Google Play, Huawei AppGallery, Amazon AppStore) or directly from GitHub.
